name: CLICKERS
description:
DESCRIPTION:

You control a cursor and you have to click the button to get points. If you get a certain number of points, will appear a new enemy. Don't let the enemies touch you!

CREDITS:

"In a Heartbeat" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
